Dialogue.Page: It looks like the light is traveling downward as it pulsates... oh, I bet it’s energy! Energy from the star, being collected and sent down to... something. Yeah, that would make sense.
Alright, let’s see where the path that totally exists keeps going...
The path that continues in the direction away from the entrance, to be specific. Yep, that one.
I bet it goes down a giant hole and then to the other tower on the north pole. Good thing I can follow it and find out!
